title: DockPanel Control
body: Windows XAML needs a version of DockPanel from WPF.  There are lots of simple scenarios that Grid and RelativePanel just can't handle that require a custom layout today, but could be done in WPF using a simple DockPanel.  DockPanel should be ported to Windows XAML.

comments.body: Shawn Kendro: "Can you give some examples of what cannot be accomplished with a Grid?"
I used DockPanel heavily in WPF. I'm not a "who moved my cheese" kind of guy but it just feels like unnecessary hassle for me to have to figure out the equivalent in UWP.
It is not necessary to have DockPanel directly in UWP, but it may be suitable for community toolkit: https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/issues/996
Can you give some examples of what cannot be accomplished with a Grid?
